text: Mbe nen mani ga nzuaim, mani mba tuavar ana manin hɨgap, mani phorga verav, mani ga suaŋgi bigi, mani nta neŋgi. Mani nta neŋga vov, ana mani phorgav phenan vugap, mbe mbɨr zav ana viktuma ndigap, Fhe Bakɨme ndikndigap, ana phorga suaŋgiap, ana phɨrgiap mani ga ndɨɨim, mani ana kheharav khaŋ nzuai, “Khe Zisas ma!”
